## ZipArchive.ZipArchiveCreator.create() method

Create a ZIP archive from file system paths (compatible with existing ZipArchiver)

**Signature:**

```typescript
create(options: IZipArchiveOptions, onProgress?: ZipArchiveProgressCallback): Promise<Result<IZipArchiveResult>>;
```
